member.name: T:ThaiTextCompare.Core.SymptomDictionary
member.summary: Manages Thai medical symptom dictionary with dynamic word addition and compound pattern support

member.summary: Default Thai medical symptom dictionary loaded from JSON file

member.summary: Loads default symptoms from JSON file

member.summary: Fallback symptom list if JSON loading fails

member.summary: Gets the current symptom dictionary including dynamically added words

member.summary: Adds new words to the symptom dictionary
member.param: Array of new symptom words to add

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.SymptomDictionary.AddCompoundSymptomPattern(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a compound symptom pattern that will be automatically expanded
member.param: The compound pattern (e.g., "แขนซ้าย-ขาซ้ายอ่อนแรง")
The expanded format (e.g., "แขนซ้ายอ่อนแรง ขาซ้ายอ่อนแรง")
member.returns: True if added successfully, false if pattern already exists

member.summary: Gets all registered compound symptom patterns

member.summary: Removes words from the symptom dictionary

member.summary: Resets the dictionary to the default state

member.summary: Gets statistics about the current dictionary

member.summary: Reloads the default dictionary from JSON file
member.returns: True if reload was successful, false otherwise

member.summary: Gets the path to the JSON file being used
member.returns: Path to JSON file or null if using fallback

member.summary: Loads synonym mappings from JSON file

member.summary: Loads medical abbreviations from JSON file

member.summary: Loads Thai conjunctions from JSON file

member.summary: Loads compound patterns from JSON and applies them to the dictionary

Optional expanded format (e.g., "แขนซ้ายอ่อนแรง ขาซ้ายอ่อนแรง")

member.summary: Creates common compound patterns for body side weakness
member.param: Side (ซ้าย or ขวา)
Body parts (e.g., แขน, ขา)

member.name: T:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer
member.summary: Tokenizes Thai medical text with support for dynamic dictionary and compound patterns

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ThaiMedicalTokenizer
member.param: Array of medical symptoms for tokenization

member.summary: Creates a tokenizer with dynamic dictionary support

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.RefreshDictionary
member.summary: Refreshes the tokenizer with the current dynamic dictionary

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.TokenizeThaiSymptoms(System.String)
member.summary: Tokenizes Thai medical symptom text into individual symptoms

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.FilterConjunctions(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Filters out Thai conjunctions and common function words from the token list

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.ProcessNegationPatterns(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Processes negation patterns in Thai medical text to create negated symptoms Converts patterns like "ไม่ ไข้" to "ไม่ไข้" or "!ไข้"

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.CalculateLevenshteinDistance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates Levenshtein distance between two strings for more accurate typo detection

member.summary: Determines if a character is in the Thai Unicode range
member.returns: True if character is Thai, false otherwise

member.name: M:ThaiTextCompare.Core.ThaiMedicalTokenizer.ExpandCompoundSymptoms(System.String)
member.summary: Expands compound symptoms using dynamic patterns from JSON configuration

member.summary: Gets typo correction suggestions for a given word
member.returns: Dictionary of correction type and suggested corrections

member.summary: Normalizes spaces and medical abbreviations in text
